front.title: IEEE Guide for the Use of IEEE Std 1641, IEEE Standard for Signal and Test Definition

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Guidance in the use of the signal and test definition (STD) standard, IEEE Std 1641-2010, is provided. IEEE Std 1641 provides the means to define and describe signals used in testing. This guide describes how to form complex signals usable across all test platforms.
